job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: strongIts fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what theyre doing brbrstrongWere committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the businessbrbrstrongMachine Learning EngineerbrbrstrongstrongemIn the time it takes you to read this job description roughly 1380 emergencies will be handled by RapidSOSbrbremstrongRapidSOS is hiring Join an advanced emergency technology startup in transforming emergency response for hundreds of millions of people globallybrbrIn partnership with public safety RapidSOS has created the worlds first emergency response data platform that securely links lifesaving data from 350M connected devices directly to 911 and first responders in an emergency Through the platform were providing intelligent data that supports over 4800 Emergency Communications Centers protecting 90 of people in the US across 150 million emergencies annuallybrbrPartnering with innovative companies recognized as RapidSOS Ready were striving to reach everyone Together were empowering a faster and smarter response by sending first responders critical data like your exact location realtime health information and crash data Were united in our commitment to a safer stronger future where technology and people work seamlessly together to save livesbrbrRapidSOS is backed by top venture capital firms and the former Csuite of Apple ATampT Verizon Vodafone Virgin Group Lucent Raytheon the FCC Harvard Data Initiative and MITbrbrVideo uRapidSOS 3Min Summary VideobrbrustronguRapidSOS In The Last 18 Monthsbrustrongulli Launched in multiple countries internationally lili Doubled team size lili Grew revenue 10x lili Raised 100M lili Managed 200M emergencies on average 400Kday lili Helped save thousands of lives brliulstronguWhat This Role Is AboutbrbrustrongAt RapidSOS we rely on insightful data to power our systems and solutions We are looking for a motivated Machine Learning Engineer to join our team who will identify ways to make the Data Science organization more effective at ensuring data availability quality and consistency You will work collaboratively with other data scientists product managers and our engineering teams to build a platform that provides lifesaving data to dispatchers currently covering over 92 of the US populationbrbrstronguWhat Youll Dobrustrongulli Manage processing of data ingestion and pipelining ensure all critical data sources are being ingested into the data warehouse lili Research publicly available sources and public APIs to incorporate and enrich the data that we use in our intelligent data platform lili Automate and productize analytical processes and data pipelines lili Implement data models to support the backend of our products lili Collaborate with the data science team machine learning engineers and product stakeholders to ensure the endtoend success of RapidSOS solutions brliulstronguWhat Were Looking For In Our Ideal Candidatebrustrongulli 3 years of experience in data engineering lili BS or higher in Computer Science or similarly quantitativetechnical field or equivalent experience lili Experience with any of the following technologies Hadoop Spark ElasticSearch relational SQL and NoSQL databases lili Experience working with big data sets and the AWS ecosystem lili Experience with objectorientedobject function scripting languages Python Java C Scala etc lili Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools Azkaban Luigi Airflow etc brliulstronguWhat We Offerbrustrongulli The chance to work with a passionate team on solving one of the largest challenges globally lili Competitive salary and benefits and equity participation lili A dynamic flexible and fun startup work environment with a highly talented team brliulIf youre curious to learn more about RapidSOS you can check out our ufull press listu brbrIf you like wild growth and working with happy enthusiastic overachievers youll enjoy your career with us
